Collection.LongName: OMI/Aura TOMS-Like Ozone and Radiative Cloud Fraction Daily L3 Global 0.25x0.25 deg
Collection.DataSetId: OMI/Aura TOMS-Like Ozone and Radiative Cloud Fraction Daily L3 Global 0.25x0.25 deg V003
Collection.Description:
The Version-003 of Level-3 Aura/OMI daily global TOMS-Like Total Column Ozone gridded product (OMTO3e) is generated by the NASA OMI science team by picking the best pixel (shortest path length) data from the good quality filtered level-2 total column ozone data (OMTO3) that fall in the 0.25x0.25 degree global grids. The OMTO3 Product is a Level-2 (orbital swath, 13x24 km spatial resolution at nadir) product based on the enhanced TOMS version-8 algorithm. The OMTO3e product is made available to the OMI data user from the GES DISC site( http://mirador.gsfc.nasa.gov/). The documents giving the details of data filtering and the data read and visualization software are made available from the OMTO3 product site, http://disc.gsfc.nasa.gov/Aura/OMI/omto3e_v003.shtml.
(The shortname for this Level-3 TOMS-Like total column ozone product is OMTO3e_V003) OMTO3e data is stored in HDF-EOS5 format. Each file contains total column ozone, radiative cloud fraction and solar and viewing zenith angles. The file size is approximately 2.8 Mbytes. The capabilities of parameter and spatial sub-settings in HDF and ASCII formats are available from the GES DISC data download site http://mirador.gsfc.nasa.gov/. OMTO3e data is also available in the GES DISC Giovanni system, an online Web-based browser for previewing and exploring the key parameters (http://giovanni.gsfc.nasa.gov/). There are two Aura/OMI daily global TOMS-Like Total Column Ozone gridded products, OMTO3e is gridded in 0.25x0.25 degree, and OMTO3d is gridded in 1x1 degree.
Collection.CitationForExternalPublication: ORIGINATOR: Pawan K. Bhartia PUBLICATION DATE: April 2012 TITLE: OMI/Aura TOMS-Like Ozone and Radiative Cloud Fraction Daily L3 Global 0.25x0.25 deg

AdditionalAttribute.Name: OPeNDAPServer
AdditionalAttribute.Description: Access the OMI Level-3 global 1.0x1.0 deg TOMS-Like Total Column Ozone gridded product (OMTO3e) through OPeNDAP.

OnlineResource.Description: Access the OMI Level-3 global 1.0x1.0 deg TOMS-Like Total Column Ozone gridded product (OMTO3e) by FTP.
Direct Access to OMI Level-3 global 1.0x1.0 deg TOMS-Like Total Column Ozone gridded product (OMTO3e) from the GES DISC Mirador fast search and download system
Access the OMI Level-3 global 1.0x1.0 deg TOMS-Like Total Column Ozone gridded product (OMTO3e) using Simple Subset Wizard (Search and subset by date and spatial region).
Search OMI Level-3 global 1.0x1.0 deg TOMS-Like Total Column Ozone gridded product (OMTO3e) using ECHO's next generation Earth Science discovery tool (Reverb).

Near real-time (NRT) data are available from OMI for certain L2 and L3 products. Whereas the standard OMI forward processing acquires 2-hour L0 files from the GES DISC within 6-7 hours of real time, LANCE-OMI acquires session-based L0 files from EDOS and the end of the session is available within 10-30 minutes after real time.
